chunk:
Knours. Sweet Rescue Bubble Burst Serum

Brand: Knours.

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Water, Isopentyldiol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Dextrin Palmitate/Ethylhexanoate, Squalane, Betaine, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Tre

te Crosspolymer, Tremella Fuciformis Polysaccharide, Passiflora Incarnata Flower Extract, Agastache Mexicana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Extract, Vitex Agnus-Castus Extract, Lithospermum Erythrorhizon Root Extract, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Rhus Semialata Extract, Chrysanthellum In

t, Chrysanthellum Indicum Extract, Panthenol, Adenosine, Arginine, Propanediol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin

Directions: After thoroughly cleansing and toning your face, use dropper to dispense desired amount into hand or directly onto face and massage into skin, gently melting bubbles

ntly melting bubbles until fully absorbed.

Warnings: For external use only. Do not swallow. Keep out of the reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.
